sql-case.value: SELECT * FROM t_order WINDOW w AS (PARTITION BY order_id)
SELECT * FROM t_order FETCH NEXT 1 ROW ONLY
SELECT * FROM t_order FOR UPDATE OF t_order
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY user_id ORDER BY order_id ASC) AS row_, user_id, order_id FROM t_order
SELECT * FROM t_order_item START WITH order_id = %s CONNECT BY NOCYCLE PRIOR item_id=item_id-1

SELECT order_id_value,order_item_id_value FROM (select 1001 as order_id_value, 100001 as order_item_id_value from dual) MODEL RETURN UPDATED ROWS DIMENSION BY(order_item_id_value) MEASURES(order_id_value) RULES(order_id_value[1] = 10001)
INSERT ALL INTO TABLE_XXX (field1) VALUES (field1) SELECT field1 FROM TABLE_XXX2
INSERT FIRST INTO TABLE_XXX (field1) VALUES (field1) SELECT field1 FROM TABLE_XXX2
DELETE TABLE_XXX1, TABLE_xxx2 FROM TABLE_XXX1 JOIN TABLE_XXX2
DELETE FROM TABLE_XXX1, TABLE_xxx2 USING TABLE_XXX1 JOIN TABLE_XXX2
